deploySmartVault((string,string,string,u.details: Requirements: - caller must have role ROLE_HPF_SMART_VAULT_DEPLOYER

params.specification: Specifications for the new smart vault.

deploySmartVaultDeterministically((strin.details: Requirements: - caller must have role ROLE_HPF_SMART_VAULT_DEPLOYER

params.specification: Specifications for the new smart vault.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.specification: Specifications for the new smart vault.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrades the beacon to a new implementation. Emits an {Upgraded} event. Requirements: - msg.sender must be the owner of the contract. - `newImplementation` must be a contract.

deploySmartVault((string,string,string,u.notice: Deploys a new smart vault into the Spool ecosystem.

deploySmartVaultDeterministically((strin.notice: Deploys a new smart vault to a deterministic address.

predictDeterministicAddress((string,stri.notice: Predicts deployment address deterministically deployed smart vault.
